1960.title: The Freewheelin' Bob Dylan
1960.description: Revolver is the seventh studio album by the English rock band the Beatles. Released on 5 August 1966, it was the Beatles' final recording project before their retirement as live performers, and marked a progression on their 1965 release Rubber Soul in terms of the group's readiness to experiment in the recording studio.

1970.title: The Piper At The Gates Of Dawn
1970.description: Please check carefully the existing vinyl releases before adding new releases to the database to avoid duplicates. There are many slightly different versions of this release, and especially the reissues / reprints with black Columbia labels from late 60's to early 70's are hard to tell apart.

1970.title: Nuova Compagnia Di Canto Popolare
1970.description: The Nuova Compagnia di Canto Popolare was originally a folk group, formed in Naples in 1967 by Carlo D'Angiò, playing from popular canzone napoletana to american spirituals..
